mapper.select: select B.* from zteacher A ,zschedule B,zteacher_schedule C where A.zid=C.zteacherID and C.zscheduleID=B.zid and #{time} BETWEEN B.zstartdate AND B.zenddate and A.zname=#{zname};
mapper.update: update zschedule set zselecttest = #{zselecttest},zpassingscore=#{zpassingscore} where zid=#{zid}

update zschedule set zselecttest = #{zselecttest},zpassingscore=#{zpassingscore} where zid=#{zid} and zstudentID=(select zstudentID from zstudent_login where zrecognizeIP =(select zstudentPCIP from ztraining_facility where zid =#{zid}));
mapper.select: select * from zschedule where #{zstartdate} between zstartdate and zenddate and zcourseID !=(select zid from zcourse where zname='临时课程')
select zid from zschedule where zcourseID=(select zid from zcourse where zname=#{coursename})
